description:
Check out these crazy light poles. In a single section, the Black Diamond Vapor Carbon poles offer the best balance of strength and weight. Engineered for gram-conscious ski tourers and ski mountaineers, the ultralight foam grip has a sticky rubber top for adjusting bindings on the go.

  • Carbon fibre construction with glass fibre reinforcements for lightweight resilience
  • Ultralight foam grip with integrated foam grip extension
  • Dual density rubber top for on-the-go binding adjustments
  • Touring Series webbing strap with locking buckle
  • 75mm Freeride baskets included
  • Compatible with ¾ inch baskets
  • 336g per pair (120cm)
name: Black Diamond BD Vapor Carbon Poles
